title: Experience
subtitle: Work, Internship and Volunteership
description: I have worked with some evolving companies and startups as Web Developer. I am also involved with many opensource communities as a representative.

experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
experiences.description: Worked on their next service - Innerloop ( media management portal ). Added new features such as Content management, Story creation from content, User dashboard etc using ReactJS, SCSS, NodeJS and Azure services.

experiences.title: Full Stack Web Developer - Intern
experiences.description: Worked as a full stack web developer on wedmeplz official website managing their business. Created frontend webpages using Nextjs, Styled- components and Material-ui. Worked on backend apis using Graphql and AWS services.

experiences.title: Product Web Development Intern
experiences.description: Implemented required figma design on their official website showing their business idea and introducingtheir android app. Worked mainly on frontend in Nextjs ,SCSS, Bootstrap.

experiences.title: Open Source Contributor - LGMSOC
experiences.description: One of the Top contributors in LetsGrowMore SummerOfCode contributing to open source projects provided by LetsGrowMoreCommunity

experiences.title: Internshala Student Partner
experiences.description: Ranked 80th / 22,827 as a Campus Ambassador for promoting their business idea and services using social media and online meet

experiences.title: Campus Ambassador
